javadoc:
Interface for listeners who want progress and transient message information from QWorkers while
 processing items.

methods.name: progressChanged
methods.comment: Notification that progress has changed during the processing of an item.

params.name: id
params.comment:
the id of the item being processed.  Since multiple items can be processed concurrently,
 the id can be used to "demultiplex" the progress and messages being generated.

params.name: currentProgress
params.comment: the current value of the progress for this task.

methods.name: taskStarted
methods.comment: Notification that a new task has been generated to process an item.

params.name: id
params.comment: the id of the item being processed.

methods.name: taskEnded
methods.comment: Notification that a new task has completed processing for an item.

params.name: id
params.comment: the id of the item that has completed processing.

params.name: totalCount
params.comment: the total number of items that have been submitted to the ConcurrentQ

params.name: completedCount
params.comment: the total number of items that completed processing.

methods.name: progressModeChanged
methods.comment: Notification that the progress mode has changed from/to indeterminate mode

params.name: id
params.comment: the id of the item that has completed processing.

params.name: item
params.comment: the item that was being processed when the worker changed the max progress.

methods.name: progressMessageChanged

params.name: id
params.comment: the id of the item that has completed processing.

params.name: item
params.comment: the item that was being processed when the worker changed the max progress.

methods.name: maxProgressChanged
methods.comment: Notification the the max progress value has changed.

params.name: id
params.comment: the id of the item that has completed processing.

params.name: item
params.comment: the item that was being processed when the worker changed the max progress.

params.name: maxProgress
params.comment: the max value of the progress for this task.

name: QProgressListener
comment:
Interface for listeners who want progress and transient message information from QWorkers while
 processing items.
